title: card.wifi Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing Wi-Fi connection status and configuration information from the Notecard.

secure.description: Indicates whether the Wi-Fi connection is secure

version.description: Version information of the Wi-Fi subsystem or firmware

ssid.description: The SSID (Service Set Identifier) of the currently connected Wi-Fi network

security.description: The security protocol used by the Wi-Fi connection (e.g., wpa2-psk, wpa3, open)

samples.description: Wi-Fi connection status and configuration information
